title: FS: Ee-Yah! Hughie Jennings One Hand x 2 (Old Mill, Polar Bear) *SOLD*

posts.post_title: FS: Ee-Yah! Hughie Jennings One Hand x 2 (Old Mill, Polar Bear) *SOLD*
posts.post_content:
Two Hughies up for grabs today. Both, vibrant and interesting with challenging backs. PM or email me with questions or interest.

SGC 40 Old Mill $SOLD
[IMG]http://joedeltufo.com/t206/T206Jennings_Hand_f.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://joedeltufo.com/t206/T206Jennings_Hand_r.jpg[/IMG]

RAW Polar Bear $SOLD
[IMG]http://joedeltufo.com/t206/T206Jennings_Hand_raw_f.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://joedeltufo.com/t206/T206Jennings_Hand_raw_r.jpg[/IMG]
Nice cards!! Good luck moving them.
Thanks, Dean! That T202 Cobb/Jennings I picked up from you is still the prize of my collection.
Polar Bear is sold. Surely an Old Mill SGC 40 Hall of Famer is worth $120?

That exact card has sold on eBay 3 times in the last few years (check cardtarget.com).  It has never sold for $120.  Range from $103 to $118.

I'll offer $100 even.
